filesystem-server.description: MCP server for file system access. Allows agents to read/write files in the output directory.

notes.what_is_mcp: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a standard for connecting AI models to external data and tools.
notes.why_use_mcp: MCP prevents vendor lock-in. A tool written for one AI system works with any MCP-compatible system.
notes.analogy: MCP is like USB-C for AI - a universal connector for tools and data.

production_setup.step2: Configure in your agent's mcp_servers parameter
production_setup.step3: The agent can now use file operations through MCP
